docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: The Skyline Wiki is a non-commercial knowledge base built for, and by fans and owners of Nissan Skylines around the world. It is open to contribution by anyone in the community.

docs.title: History
docs.text: A brief history of the Skyline from the ALSIS-1 in 1957 to the V37 in the present day.

docs.title: Using this site
docs.text: Information on this site is organsied by generations, with each generation of Skyline having it's own subsections around specifications, buying guides, service and maintenance, tips and guides. If you've got a handy hint, we'd love to include it.

docs.title: Directory
docs.text: Handy links to various online communities, retailers and specialists.

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text:
If you find a mistake or want to add new content, you can submit changes directly to the site. You can use the edit button on the top right of any article to add them in a pull request, if you don't know what that means, you can always open an issue.

Info

Nissan, Nissan Skyline, Nissan GTR, Skyline and associated logos are trademarks of Nissan Motor Co., Ltd.
